verses.verse: Stand firm <S%G4739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> in the liberty <S%G1657><s%> by which <S%G3739><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> has made <S%G1659><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> free, <S%G1659><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> be <S%G1758><s%> entangled <S%G1758><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> with a yoke <S%G2218><s%> of bondage. <S%G1397><s%>

Behold, <S%G1492><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> Paul, <S%G3972><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you receive circumcision, <S%G4059><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> will profit <S%G5623><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

Yes, <S%G1161><s%> I testify <S%G3143><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> who receives circumcision, <S%G4059><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a debtor <S%G3781><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> the <S%G3551><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

You are alienated <S%G2673><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> you <S%G2673><s%> who desire <S%G3748><s%> to be justified <S%G1344><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%> You have fallen away from <S%G1601><s%> grace. <S%G5485><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> we, <S%G2249><s%> through the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> wait for <S%G553><s%> the hope <S%G1680><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> neither <S%G3777><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> amounts <S%G2480><s%> to anything, <S%G5100><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> uncircumcision, <S%G203><s%> but <S%G235><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> working <S%G1754><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

You were running <S%G5143><s%> well! <S%G2573><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> interfered <S%G348><s%> with you <S%G5209><s%> that you should <S%G3982><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> the truth? <S%G1465><s%>
This <S%G3588><s%> persuasion <S%G3988><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> him who <S%G3588><s%> calls <S%G2564><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>
A little <S%G3398><s%> yeast <S%G2219><s%> grows through <S%G2220><s%> the <S%G5445><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> lump. <S%G5445><s%>

I <S%G1473><s%> have confidence <S%G3982><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you will <S%G5426><s%> think <S%G5426><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> other <S%G243><s%> way. <S%G1161><s%> But he who <S%G3588><s%> troubles <S%G5015><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> will bear <S%G941><s%> his <S%G3588><s%> judgment, <S%G3748><s%> whoever <S%G302><s%> he is. <S%G5600><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I, <S%G1473><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G2784><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> preach <S%G2784><s%> circumcision, <S%G4061><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> am I <S%G1377><s%> still <S%G2089><s%> persecuted? <S%G1377><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> the stumbling <S%G4625><s%> block of the cross <S%G4716><s%> has <S%G2673><s%> been removed. <S%G2673><s%>
I wish <S%G3785><s%> that those who <S%G3588><s%> disturb <S%G387><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> would <S%G3785><s%> cut themselves <S%G2532><s%> off. <S%G609><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> you, <S%G5210><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> were called <S%G2564><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> freedom. <S%G1657><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> use your freedom <S%G1657><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> gain <S%G874><s%> to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but <S%G235><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> love <S%G26><s%> be servants <S%G1398><s%> to one another. <S%G240><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the whole <S%G3956><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> is fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> word, <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this: <S%G3588><s%> "You shall love <S%G25><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> yourself. <S%G1438><s%>"

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you bite <S%G1143><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> devour <S%G2719><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> be careful <S%G991><s%> that you <S%G355><s%> don't <S%G3361><s%> consume <S%G355><s%> one <S%G240><s%> <S%G5259><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>

But I say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1161><s%> walk <S%G4043><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> you <S%G5055><s%> won't <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> fulfill <S%G5055><s%> the lust <S%G1939><s%> of the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> lusts <S%G1937><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are contrary <S%G480><s%> to one another, <S%G240><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you <S%G4160><s%> may not <S%G3361><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> the things <S%G5023><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> <S%G99999><s%> you desire. <S%G2309><s%>
But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> you are led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> you are <S%G2075><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of the flesh <S%G4561><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> obvious, <S%G5318><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> are: <S%G2076><s%> adultery, <S%G3430><s%> sexual immorality, <S%G4202><s%> uncleanness, <S%G167><s%> lustfulness, <S%G766><s%>

idolatry, <S%G1495><s%> sorcery, <S%G5331><s%> hatred, <S%G2189><s%> strife, <S%G2052><s%> jealousies, <S%G2205><s%> outbursts of anger, <S%G2372><s%> rivalries, <S%G2052><s%> divisions, <S%G1370><s%> heresies, <S%G139><s%>

envyings, <S%G5355><s%> murders, <S%G5408><s%> drunkenness, <S%G3178><s%> orgies, <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> things <S%G5125><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> these; <S%G3739><s%> of which I forewarn <S%G4302><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> even <S%G4302><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> I <S%G4277><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> forewarned <S%G4277><s%> you, <S%G3754><s%> that those who <S%G3588><s%> practice <S%G4238><s%> such things <S%G5108><s%> will <S%G2816><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> inherit <S%G2816><s%> the Kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> the fruit <S%G2590><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> joy, <S%G5479><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> kindness, <S%G5544><s%> goodness, <S%G19><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%>
gentleness, <S%G4236><s%> and self-control. <S%G1466><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> things there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> law. <S%G3551><s%>

Those <S%G1161><s%> who belong <S%G3588><s%> to Christ <S%G5547><s%> have crucified <S%G4717><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> its passions <S%G3804><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lusts. <S%G1939><s%>
If <S%G1487><s%> we live <S%G2198><s%> by the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> let <S%G4748><s%>'s also <S%G2532><s%> walk <S%G4748><s%> by the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
Let <S%G1096><s%>'s not <S%G3361><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> conceited, <S%G2755><s%> provoking <S%G4292><s%> one another, <S%G240><s%> and envying <S%G5354><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>
